item.description:
It's All About the Boutiques!

This months meetup focuses on Boston boutiques and their important role in Boston fashion.
They are one of the key trendsetters of our city and play a major role in Boston's economic growth.

Boston boutique owners and managers will join us to discuss the process of opening and running a boutique. They will also bring some samples of products they are currently selling.

We would also encourage all of you to bring samples of you work as well; regardless if its a sample, portfolio or completed piece.

We look forward to seeing you all there.
item.how_to_find_us: We will greet you. Make sure you RSVP Yes so that we know you are coming.
item.name: It's all about the Boutiques - The Boston Fashion Industry May Meetup
